akn:section.akn:heading: Exemption from restriction on transporting certain cargo

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 55333. Exemption from restriction on transporting certain cargo The 3-year documentation requirement of section 55305(a) of this title does not apply to a vessel designated as an American Great Lakes vessel during the period of its designation. (Pub. L. 109–304, § 8(c), Oct. 6, 2006, 120 Stat. 1649.)

This section is substituted for the source provisions to eliminate unnecessary words.
